name: staffing-esn
description: Application de staffing ESN avec chat IA et architecture serverless

scripts.bootstrap: cd api && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:api -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.typecheck: cd api && npm run typecheck && cd ../frontend && npm run typecheck
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.clean: rm -rf api/node_modules frontend/node_modules api/.wrangler frontend/dist api/dist
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run bootstrap

author: Staffing ESN Team
